Text:
I'm getting this error even after installing the update 

System.DllNotFoundException: Unable to load DLL 'GSDemoConfigUtilitiesDll.dll': The application has failed to start because its side-by-side configuration is incorrect. Please see the application event log or use the command-line sxstrace.exe tool for more detail. (Exception from HRESULT: 0x800736B1)

Long install, but works just fine.

I'd suggest the skidrow version though unless you need to save bandwidth. :p
I am having the same problem
Same problem here. I think this repack is broken.

I get passed
 "Unable to load DLL 'GSDemoConfigUtilitiesDll.dll'" 
error by installing Microsoft Visual C++ 2005 + SP1 + MFC Security Update 

but now I'm getting application error (0xc0150002) how to solve this please help

ok, finally i got it work. for those who still have launch error problems install this:

http://download.microsoft.com/download/8/B/4/8B42259F-5D70-43F4-AC2E-4B208FD8D66A/vcredist_x86.EXE

and:

http://download.microsoft.com/download/5/D/8/5D8C65CB-C849-4025-8E95-C3966CAFD8AE/vcredist_x86.exe

to darkony1992
thanks man i almost gave up on playing the game
I thought KaOs Krew lost their touch 
I'm playing now good game.
